info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Columbia, southern Albany, northeastern Greene and southwestern Rensselaer Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Westerlo, or 13 miles northwest of Catskill, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chatham, New Baltimore, Ravena, Coxsackie, Valatie, Castleton-On-Hudson, Kinderhook, Preston Hollow, Preston-Potter Hollow, Coeymans, Cairo, Ghent, Stockport, Durham, Stuyvesant, Coeymans Hollow, Van Hoesen Station, Dormansville, Rossman and Result. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 21B and 21A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
